title: D+vine Luv
synopsis: Hyde is a traveling treasure hunter who arrived in Arville with his childhood friend Sakura. Near Arville is a cave, its the largest ruin of the world. Hyde came across a dying man, whom placed a mysterious amulet within Hyde's hands. A week later, the amulet started to glow.
staff: [['Takahashi, Hideo', ['Sound Director']], ['Takatsu, Yukio', ['Key Animation', ' Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Nagano, Miharu', ['Key Animation']]]
